name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert W. THOMAS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert W. THOMAS, Appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
460 A.2d 1074
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Robert W. THOMAS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 7, 1982.
Decided Dec. 29, 1982.
Reargument Denied April 4, 1983.
F. Emmett Fitzpatrick, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Stephen B. Harris, First Asst. Dist. Atty., Doylestown, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
